entry.dcterms:title: Second National Patient Satisfaction Survey 2001. Opinions of Visitors About Hospital Treatment in Hungary.
entry.dcterms:creator: Nagy, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E49l: Second National Patient Satisfaction Survey 2001. Opinions of Visitors About Hospital Treatment in Hungary.. data sheet. Version: 2007-02-12
entry.dcterms:creator: Tóth, István György
entry.dcterms:description: opinion about the hospital health services by the relatives of patients having received health services in hospitals; opinion about the quality of information received about treatments
entry.dcterms:subject: health condition
health care and medical treatment
person
survey data
cross-section

41 hospitals were randomly selected from the list provided by the customer, out of which 38 were willing to participate in the survey. The interviewers handed over a postal questionnaire to each visitor leaving the hospitals in the sample.
Posted self-administered questionnaires.
A
